loan.name: Diana
loan.use: to buy a tractor rental and pay labor costs for brushing and weeding for her business.
loan.description:
Diana is a 51-year-old woman who is married with three children. They live in a rural community outside Honiara, the capital of Solomon Islands.

She has a garden where she grows vegetables and root crops that she can sell at the market to earn a living. She has been in this business for more than 10 years.

Mary has requested a loan to pay for a tractor rental and labor costs for brushing and weeding to make a new garden to grow more root crops and vegetables.

She hopes to use the profits from her sales to provide financial support for her family.

She joined SPBD in 2015.
loan.whySpecial: Its goal is to reach financially excluded and underserved people.
loan.partnerName: South Pacific Business Development (SPBD) - Solomon Islands
